validateMoveChoice(Vehicle, Position) - Method in class Game.GameEngine
Validates the proposed movement choice of a vehicle, ensuring it's feasible within the current game state and traffic conditions.
validateMoveChoice(Vehicle, Position) - Method in interface Game.MovementControl
Validates a vehicle's proposed new position within the traffic network to ensure it is a feasible and safe move, given the current traffic conditions and network constraints.
